snippet: Tariq al-Hashimi, the Sunni vice president of Iraq, will not be sent back to face a death sentence, Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan of Turkey said Tuesday.
abstract: Turkish Prime Min Recep Tayyip Erdogan say he will not send Tariq al-Hashimi, the Sunni vice president of Iraq, back to Iraq to face a death sentence; Hashimi, a fierce critic of Prime Min Nuri Kamal al-Maliki, a Shiite, was convicted in absentia of running death squads.
lead_paragraph: Tariq al-Hashimi, the Sunni vice president of Iraq, will not be sent back to face a death sentence, Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan of Turkey said Tuesday.

headline.main: Turkey: Iraqi Vice President Will Not Be Sent Back
headline.print_headline: Turkey: Iraqi Vice President Will Not Be Sent Back
